name: Add Toggl time tracking reports to Notion
description:
Use this template to automatically add time tracking reports from Toggl to Notion databases. It retrieves data on how much time was spent on different projects by different individuals for the previous day.

The template setup assumes you have created Notion databases for each project. Use unique names that include the names of the projects in Toggl. See our Notion [database](https://www.notion.so/89572a3248734024bafa53d30f64a8f6?v=82045f64d13944f0bcbb017fe9664d23) for reference.

The scenario is scheduled to run every morning at 06:00. You can change it by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
